snippet.title: IMSCARED - STEAM GREENLIGHT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Help Imscared - A Pixelated Nightmare being Greenlit!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=414743662

Imscared - A Pixelated Nightmare is a metahorror game I made in 2012: The game had a lot of success, becoming a standard for the pixelated horror experiences. 
This Steam version of Imscared will be free to play just like the original counterpart. 

Imscared protagonizes the player, putting him in a surreal first-person experience. Find keys, open doors and search for the exit of this short nightmare. 
The game uses raw 3D graphics to enhance the player's imagination and general atmosphere. 
You can try the game on GameJolt at http://gamejolt.com/games/other/imscared-a-pixelated-nightmare/10058/ 

If You already knew Imscared, then be afraid: as you can see in the video, new stuff is coming on Steam (if the game reaches the Greenlit state): share the Steam Greenlight page, vote for Yes, comment and stay tuned for more awesome infos!
